title: Register FO-09 in nav.config.ts and overview page
description:
Register FO-09 in two places:

## 1. nav.config.ts

Add entry to navTree array (after FO-08):
{
  label: "FO-09",
  href: "/fo-09",
  children: [
    { label: "Demo", href: "/fo-09" },
    { label: "Info", href: "/fo-09/info" },
  ],
}

## 2. app/overview/page.tsx

Add entry to versions array:
{
  id: "FO-09",
  name: "Sentences + Card Curation",
  href: "/fo-09",
  tagline: "Lower friction discovery, focused curation",
  description: "Complete sentences on first discovery screen, hybrid fragments on subsequent screens. Card-based one-at-a-time affirmation review with unlimited generate more cycles.",
  inputType: "Sentences -> Fragments",
  outputType: "Card curation (Love it / Discard)",
  highlight: "Two-stage discovery + unlimited curation",
}

Files to modify:
- nav.config.ts
- app/overview/page.tsx

Do not close until acceptance criteria pass.
acceptance_criteria: nav.config.ts contains FO-09 entry AND app/overview/page.tsx contains FO-09 entry AND npm run build succeeds
